name: PDO.lastInsertId
purpose: Returns the ID of the last inserted row or sequence value

return.description:
If a sequence name was not specified for the name
   parameter, PDO::lastInsertId returns a
   string representing the row ID of the last row that was inserted into
   the database.If a sequence name was specified for the name
   parameter, PDO::lastInsertId returns a
   string representing the last value retrieved from the specified sequence
   object.If the PDO driver does not support this capability,
   PDO::lastInsertId triggers an
   IM001 SQLSTATE.
